audio_analysis.transcript: Rick, are you shaving your head? We're going on an epic adventure, Morty. What? God of War, Morty, the new one. Creators as a dad, the kid is curious. Like you, Morty. You're curious. What is shaving your head? How to do it? Why do we have to do anything, Morty? I don't know, because of fear. Wrong, Morty. Money? Yeah, but not this time. Love, family. I don't know. That's good, Morty. Find your motivation. We have to make choices, and we have to face the consequences. We're going to the nine rounds. Oh! Oh my god. Oh my god. Not finally. The Lephiathan Axe and other unannounced upgrades. I thought this was about us. Huh? Yeah, sure. Whatever you want. Can you use that thing on the birds, please? And get blood on it? No. God of War, Ragnarok. Rated M for mature, available on PlayStation. I found a boat, Morty. You're going to roll, though. Not me. It's a big ax, and I have to make sure it doesn't get wet.
